name: Adelaide Maker

venue.name: The Maker’s Studio at UniSA
venue.address: Kaurna Building, City West Campus, Adelaide
venue.accessibility: UniSA and the Maker’s spaces within the Kaurna Building and Dorrit Black Building are fully equipped with disabled access and disabled toilets.
venue.under_18: At this Venue you must be accompanied by a Guardian at all times.
venue.public_transport: Tram and bus are easily accessible from the City West Campus, which is also a short walk from King William Road with plenty of routes accessible from there.
venue.parking: Wilson Car park on Hindley Street is the nearest car park available, please find map of the City West campus by clicking here (http://www.unisa.edu.au/Campus-Facilities/Maps-Tours/City-West-campus/City-West-campus-map/).
venue.public_transport_last: N/A, the event will close at 10pm on Saturday. Buses and tram are still in operation at this time.

catering: Catering will be provided for the duration of the event.
